channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.10
item.description:
What's New

Refactor Settings UI & Add English Detection Feature

  • Refactor Settings/Preferences views into reusable section components
  • Add new SettingsSections folder with modular Swift files for each section
  • Separate English word detection from spell check feature
  • Add import/export functionality for Window Title Rules (JSON format)
  • Add enable/disable toggles for built-in window title rules
  • Add quick add button for detected apps in Window Title Rules
  • Move DebugLogger to Shared for better code organization
  • Add auto-restart countdown after settings import
  • Update version to 1.2.10

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
